name: George II and the Royal Family
obverse: Busts of George II and Queen Caroline facing each other.
reverse: Busts of the seven royal children.
reverse_inscriptions: FREDERICVS P: WALLIÆ. GVLIELMVS. D: CVMBRIÆ. ANNA. AMELIA. CAROLINA. MARIA. LVDOVICA. PRINCIPES.
description: This medal is very worn and has a hole drilled at the top, likely to make the medal into a necklace.
